Name: Super Robin
About the game: It's a new crazy game again from Teen Super Titans Go Adventure. there are very few people left, but it is necessary to collect taxes. Tsar Putin could not collect one tax, so he called for the assistance of President Trump, he agreed to help, but then, unexpectedly, he decided to deceive Tsar Vladimir and took all the bitkoyins to himself. Tsar Putin could not tolerate such lawlessness and took away all the bitcoins, then Trump chased him. Now your goal is to run away from Trump and collect along the way bitcoins. Features: -You will be able to play for Tsar Putin and see Russia in the future, in an alternative reality -You can escape from Trump and collect taxes along the way -Game for patriots -Game genre: Robin -Infinite and funny gameplay (just run, when you have to jump and collect taxes (bitcoins) -Several cards for the game of your choice -Atmospheric soundtrack -Steam achievements Enjoy the new funny and crazy adventures in Teen Super Robin Go Adventure world. It's easy! just keep running and jumping and have fun. People around the world not only heard about the famous Super RobinBros Minecraft - presented based on a game with the characters of super Mario and Luigi. The main characters of the game, you guessed it, are the Italian plumber from Brooklyn, super Mario, who is fighting for the good and his brother Luigi. The main features of Robin are his red cap, thick mustache, Italian accent, cheerfulness and ability to jump high.
